doc:
Gary Holton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gary_Holton 0 Gary Frederick Holton (22 September 1952 – 25 October 1985) was an English singer-songwriter, musician and actor from London. He was the frontman of the band Heavy Metal Kids (1972–77), he worked with Casino Steel (1981–84), and played the part of Wayne in the UK television comedy Auf Wiedersehen, Pet (1983–85). Holton died from an overdose of morphine combined with alcohol in 1985. Gary_Frederick_Holton ( 22_September_1952 – 25_October_1985 ) was an_English_singer-songwriter_,_musician_and_actor from London . He was the_frontman of the_band_Heavy_Metal_Kids_(_1972 – 77_) , he worked with Casino_Steel ( 1981 – 84_) , and played the_part of Wayne in the_UK_television_comedy_Auf_Wiedersehen , Pet_(_1983 – 85_) . Holton died from an_overdose of morphine combined with alcohol in 1985 .
